column4: how can I make ubuntu a bit faster on a 1.4ghz cpu / 256mb ram?
well for starters - thing that i'm going to so - recompile kernel and install more compact window menager (ex. fluxbox)
Fluxbox eh ;-) Do my gnome apps work on it?
well, as far asi i know, if you have libraries (and you do if you have gnome installed already) then yes the'll work just like KDE aps work under gnome
